rows.label: tlk70000012_10_msg0001
rows.name:
Chairman Morumo's always busting a
gut for us merchants. He's someone we
can really count on. But...

rows.label: tlk70000012_10_msg0002
rows.name:
...it was a real shame about that
business with the Pollen Orbs...
A real nasty business it was too.

rows.label: tlk70000012_10_msg0003
rows.name:
Since you set things straight, he's
reflected on his mistakes. He's ready to
get back to what he's best at now.

rows.label: tlk70000012_10_msg0004
rows.name:
In the long run, I think it'll really have a
revitalizing effect on the merchants
here. That's my feeling.

rows.label: tlk70000012_10_msg0005
rows.name:
That's good for him, good for me, for
everyone. So I'd like to say a big
thank-you to all of you guys.

rows.label: tlk70000012_10_msg0006
rows.name:
Well, as much as I'd like to, I can't chat
with you all day. Back to work for me!

rows.label: tlk70000012_10_msg0007
rows.name:
Drop by anytime. I'll give you a
discount! Well, not a real discount.
A sort of discount of the heart.

rows.label: tlk70000012_10_msg0008
rows.name:
Yes, you'll always have a warm
welcome from me, and everyone in
Formide Shopping Ward!
